name: MOOG, INC.
description: Designer, manufacturer, and integrator of precision motion control products and systems.
sampleDescriptions:
H.R.6157 / S.3159, Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2019, Title IV, all provisions relating to microprocessors; and any title, all provisions relating to tactical vehicle weapon turrets and small liquid propulsion. 

H.R.6072 / S.3023, Department of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2019, Title I, all provisions relating to automated technologies for detection of foreign object debris.

Contacted Congressional staff to invite them to visit Moog's booth at an industry event. 

Contacted Members of Congress and their staff to invite them to visit Moog facilities.

H.R.5515 /S.2987, National Defense Authorization Act, 2019; Title II, all provisions relating to spacecraft propulsion and microprocessors; and any Title, all provisions relating to tactical vehicle weapons turrets; and all provisions relating to foreign military sales.
